item.title: The Go vs Rust in GIS
item.description: As a Geospatially minded professional, I found something missing in the so called Go vs Rust war (see reddit ðŸ˜…): what about GIS?. So here I will briefly list some of my thoughts developing in a geospatial application in Go and in Rust. Go Go is such an easy language to develop in. If you have used C or C++, you’ll be writing Go in no time. If coming from Python it might take you few extra days to understand concepts such as pointers, references or point receivers.
